name: Shadoward

abilities.name: Terra Growth
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Nature-type moves' power to 50%.

abilities.name: Agility (Secret)
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Speed stat by 1 stage at the end of each turn.

description: Shadoward lurk inside the forest and usually go active at night. They use the red end of the tail as a bait to lure their prey to their hunting ground. Combined with their green mane, they become very hard to be spotted out, making them a fearsome assassin.

moves.name: Dodge
moves.effect: Dodge upcoming attack(s), but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

moves.name: Quick Strike
moves.effect: Lunges at the opponent quickly before the target can react. This move has a +1 priority.

moves.name: Stalk
moves.effect: Stalk the opponent, allowing the next move to have +1 priority and 50% critical hit chance.

moves.name: Fury Cutter
moves.effect: Slash the opponent with scythe-like attack. Consecutive success uses of this move increases the power by 5 each time (Max. 30).

moves.name: Aerial Strike
moves.effect: Strike the opponent with quick movement in the air. This attack has a 10% critical hit chance.

moves.name: Quick Footwork
moves.effect: Increase the Evasion stat by 1 stage.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.effect: Sneak in the dark and attacks the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Light typed moves during this turn.

moves.name: Swift Cut
moves.effect: The user reacts quickly and uses its deadly tail to counter the enemy attack. This move has +2 priority but will fail if the opponent is not readying an attack.
